original_text:
Why, O Lord, do you stand far away?
    Why do you hide yourself in times of trouble?
korean_text: 여호와여 어찌하여 멀리 서시며 어찌하여 환난 때에 숨으시나이까

sentences.original_text: Why, O Lord, do you stand far away?
sentences.korean_translation: 어찌하여 오 주여, 멀리 서 계십니까?

sentences.original_text: Why do you hide yourself in times of trouble?
